analyzed: gang zhig thob pas ngan song ba'i nyon mongs pa dang zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Because of attaining that, one attains the elimination of the afflictions of the lower realms, and so on.

original: ci zhig rnyed pa las ni dbugs phyin na //
analyzed: ci zhig rnyed pa las ni dbugs phyin na //
translated: What does one find?

original: zhes bya bas ni yongs su nyams pa med par sbyor ba'i lam ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni yongs su nyams pa med par sbyor ba'i lam ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “one finds relief” shows that one does not attain the path of preparation without losing the fruit.

original: ci zhig rtogs zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ma thob pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: ci zhig rtogs zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu ma thob pa nyid du'o //
translated: What does one realize? One does not attain the fruit without realizing it.

original: snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no //
translated: As before.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How?

original: srog dbugs ma phyin pa las dbugs phyin pa thob pa ni gson pa dang 'dra bar nyal bar rung gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: srog dbugs ma phyin pa las dbugs phyin pa thob pa ni gson pa dang 'dra bar nyal bar rung gi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: One who finds relief from the lack of relief in life is like one who can sleep when alive, but not otherwise.

original: gsum po gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: gsum po gang dag gis she na /
translated: By what three?

original: lung ston pa thob pa nyid kyis ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lung ston pa thob pa nyid kyis ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: By attaining the prediction, as before.

original: thob pa la rnam pa gnyis su phye ste /
analyzed: thob pa la rnam pa gnyis su phye ste /
translated: Attainment is divided into two types.

original: bshad pa / ye shes kyi khyad par thob pa nyid kyis dang / spangs pa'i khyad par thob pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: bshad pa / ye shes kyi khyad par thob pa nyid kyis dang / spangs pa'i khyad par thob pa nyid kyis so //
translated: He says: by attaining a special intuition and by attaining a special abandonment.

original: spangs pa'i @295b khyad par yang zhes bya ba rgya cher byung ba yin no //
analyzed: spangs pa'i @295b khyad par yang zhes bya ba rgya cher byung ba yin no //
translated: And a special abandonment is also attained.

original: de la ci zhig rnyed pa las ni dbugs phyin ces bya ba ni lung bstan pa ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ci zhig rnyed pa las ni dbugs phyin ces bya ba ni lung bstan pa ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
translated: What is attained? He says: relief. This shows that the attainment of a prediction is attained.

original: ci zhig rtogs zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi khyad par ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
analyzed: ci zhig rtogs zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi khyad par ma thob pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no //
translated: What is realized? He says: the special intuition. This shows that the attainment of a special intuition is attained.

original: bde bar 'du shes phyin ci log gi gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde bar 'du shes phyin ci log gi gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the basis of the erroneous perception of pleasure.

original: bde ba ma yin pa de dag la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba ma yin pa de dag la bde ba'o snyam du 'du shes pa ste /
translated: The perception that those which are not pleasure are pleasure.

original: yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i bde ba yin pa'i phyir gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa'i bde ba yin pa'i phyir gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: Because they are associated with pain, like other pleasures.

original: bde bar 'du shes pa de nyid phyin ci log yin no //
analyzed: bde bar 'du shes pa de nyid phyin ci log yin no //
translated: That very perception of pleasure is erroneous.

original: de'i gzhi ni bde bar 'du shes phyin ci log gi gzhi ste de'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhi ni bde bar 'du shes phyin ci log gi gzhi ste de'i dngos po'o //
translated: The basis of that is the basis of the misconception of pleasure, i.e., its object.

original: de'i phyir bde bar 'du shes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde bar 'du shes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is the conception of pleasure,

original: bde ba nyid du phyin ci log gi gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba nyid du phyin ci log gi gzhi nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the basis of the misconception of pleasure itself.

original: da ni phyi ma'i phyed kyis ni 'di ltar de rnams ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung bas ji ltar de dag rmongs par byed pa de lta bu ston pa yin no //
analyzed: da ni phyi ma'i phyed kyis ni 'di ltar de rnams ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung bas ji ltar de dag rmongs par byed pa de lta bu ston pa yin no //
translated: Now, the second half of the verse beginning with “thus, they” shows how those objects cause delusion.

original: smon pa na yang mi rnams kyi ni sems //
analyzed: smon pa na yang mi rnams kyi ni sems //
translated: When one desires, the mind of men

original: rmongs na bdag nyid phrad na smos ci dgos //
analyzed: rmongs na bdag nyid phrad na smos ci dgos //
translated: is deluded; when one obtains, what need is there to speak?

original: zhes bya bas de rnams ni ma phrad kyang sred pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi sems bde bar 'du shes pas rmongs par byed nas phrad na lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: zhes bya bas de rnams ni ma phrad kyang sred pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi sems bde bar 'du shes pas rmongs par byed nas phrad na lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: This shows that when one desires, i.e., when one seeks, the mind of those who are full of craving is deluded by the conception of pleasure, and what need is there to speak when one obtains?

original: smon pa na ni 'dod pa na ste /
analyzed: smon pa na ni 'dod pa na ste /
translated: When one desires, i.e., in the realm of desire.

original: don du gnyer ba na'o //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba na'o //
translated: When one seeks.

original: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te don ji skad du bstan pa'i'o //
analyzed: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te don ji skad du bstan pa'i'o //
translated: There are two summary verses, which are to be understood as they are stated.

original: dpung thub dka' ba can zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi dpung thub par dka' ba de dag ni dpung thub par dka' ba can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dpung thub dka' ba can zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi dpung thub par dka' ba de dag ni dpung thub par dka' ba can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: nyes dmigs mang ba yin no //
analyzed: nyes dmigs mang ba yin no //

original: 'dir mnog chung ba ni nyes dmigs shin tu mang bas so //
analyzed: 'dir mnog chung ba ni nyes dmigs shin tu mang bas so //
translated: Here, they are of little essence because they are of much misfortune.

original: zhes bya ba rgya cher sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rgya cher sbyar ro //
translated: This is the extensive explanation.

original: go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: go rims bzhin no //
translated: In the same order.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /

analyzed: bag la nyal yang dag par gzhom pa ni yang dag par spang bar dka' ba nyid kyis ni rgyu ba rnams rtogs par dka' ba yin no //
translated: They are difficult to overcome by an army because they are difficult to abandon by one who is clear

analyzed: de la gsal ba'i spang ba ni gsal ba nyid spang ba yin pas gsal ba'i spong ba ste /
translated: The abandonment of clarity is the abandonment of clarity itself.

original: so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis te /
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis te /
translated: It is by the power of discernment,

original: ji skad du 'dod pa 'di dag ni mnog chung zhing sdug bsngal mang ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji skad du 'dod pa 'di dag ni mnog chung zhing sdug bsngal mang ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: @296a * // rnam par gnon pa'i spang ba ni rnam par gnon pa nyid spong ba yin pas rnam par gnon pa'i spong ba ste /
translated: The abandonment of subjugation is the abandonment of subjugation itself.

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is by the mundane path, in the detachment from the desire realm.

original: de bzhin du bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa nyid spong ba yin pas bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa nyid spong ba yin pas bag la nyal yang dag par 'joms pa'i spong ba ste /
translated: Similarly, the abandonment of the complete destruction of the latent propensities is the abandonment of the complete destruction of the latent propensities themselves.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis srid pa'i rtse mo las te /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis srid pa'i rtse mo las te /
translated: It is by the supramundane path, in the detachment from the summit of existence.

original: 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is said, “Desire is suffering.”

original: sngon rdul bsags pa zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba ni tshe rabs snga ma la nyon mongs pa bsags pa'o //
analyzed: sngon rdul bsags pa zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ba ni tshe rabs snga ma la nyon mongs pa bsags pa'o //
translated: The past is the accumulation of defilements in previous lives.

original: 'dir ni de ltar gyi tshe la'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni de ltar gyi tshe la'o //
translated: Here, it is the accumulation of defilements in this life.

original: yid 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: yid 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams kyi'o //
